title: truffle develop --log gives error on 5.4.12
body:
## Issue

Previously you can use `truffle develop --log`, now it gives `UNKNOWN_OPTION: Unknown option: --log`

## Steps to Reproduce

terminal 1: `truffle develop`
terminal 2: `truffle develop --log`

## Expected Behavior

Displays log

## Actual Results

```
UNKNOWN_OPTION: Unknown option: --log
    at commandLineArgs (/Users/x/x/node_modules/command-line-args/dist/index.js:1374:21)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/x/x/config.js:11:17)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1072:14)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1101:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:937:32)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:778:12)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:961:19)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:92:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/x/x/truffle-config.js:21:16)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1072:14)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1101:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:937:32)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:778:12)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:961:19)
    at Object.require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:92:18)
    at Function.load (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/config/dist/index.js:159:1)
Truffle v5.4.12 (core: 5.4.12)
Node v14.17.5
```

## Environment

* Operating System: mac
* Ethereum client: truffle develop
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):  Truffle v5.4.12 (core: 5.4.12)
* node version (`node --version`): Node v14.17.5
* npm version (`npm --version`): 6.14.14
